casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Thomas Ray GRINNELL, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158430
COA: 335990 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 20, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 24, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered. We DIRECT the Macomb County Prosecuting Attorney to answer the application for leave to appeal within 28 days after the date of this order.

The application for leave to appeal remains pending.
